$scope.filterBy = {
  'name': 'ro',
  'sf-location': 'ha'
}
$scope.getResource = function (params, paramsObj) {
  var urlApi = 'table.json?' + params;
  return $http.get(urlApi).then(function (response) {
    return {
      'rows': response.data.rows,
      'header': response.data.header
    }
  });
}
